definitionGroup.description: Try these for text content that drives the actual storyline.

duration.label: Duration
duration.hint: Set the duration of the slide.

gradientFadeCheck.label: Show Gradient Fade
gradientFadeCheck.hint: Set visibility for gradient fade for added legibility behind slide text.

segmentOnOff.label: Segment
segmentOnOff.hint: Apply a number box to the slide for pagination or list style.

segmentFadeIn.label: Segment Fade In
segmentFadeIn.hint: The segment box fades in at the beginning of the slide.

segmentFadeOut.label: Segment Fade Out
segmentFadeOut.hint: The segment box fades out at the end of the slide.

segmentNumber.label: Segment number
segmentNumber.hint: The number in the segment box, digits only.

segmentTextColor.label: Segment number color
segmentTextColor.hint: Set the color of the Segment Number.

segmentBoxColor.label: Segment box color
segmentBoxColor.hint: Set the color of the Segment Box.

maintextColor.label: Message Text Color
maintextColor.hint: Set the color of the Message text.

secondarytextColor.label: Description Text Color
secondarytextColor.hint: Set the color of the Description text.

audioControl.label: Audio control
audioControl.hint: Set the volume levels for background music or main asset audio on the slide.

options.label: Play Music Only
options.hint: Keep the main asset audio muted and play background music.

options.label: Mix Music and Main Asset Audio
options.hint: Mix the main asset audio with the background music.

options.label: Play Main Asset Audio Only
options.hint: Mute the background music and play only the main asset audio.

musicAudioLevel.label: Music Level
musicAudioLevel.hint: Set the music level when choosing "Mix…". 0dB equals default music level.

layerAudioLevel.label: Main Asset Audio Level
layerAudioLevel.hint: Set the audio level for the main asset. Up to 12dB boost.

showlogo.label: Show logo
showlogo.hint: Set the visibility for the logo on the slide.

highlightColor.label: Highlight color
highlightColor.hint: Set the color of the highlighted text.

tintColor.label: Tint Color
tintColor.hint: Set the color of the tint.

tintOpacity.label: Tint opacity
tintOpacity.hint: Set the opacity of the tint.

filterOpacity.label: Filter opacity
filterOpacity.hint: Set the opacity of the filter.

definitionGroup.description: Try these for text content that drives the actual storyline.

duration.label: Duration
duration.hint: Set the duration of the slide.

gradientFadeCheck.label: Show Gradient Fade
gradientFadeCheck.hint: Set visibility for gradient fade for added legibility behind slide text.

segmentOnOff.hint: Apply a number box to the slide for pagination or list style.

segmentFadeIn.label: Segment Fade In
segmentFadeIn.hint: The segment box fades in at the beginning of the slide.

segmentFadeOut.label: Segment Fade Out
segmentFadeOut.hint: The segment box fades out at the end of the slide.

segmentNumber.label: Segment number
segmentNumber.hint: The number in the segment box, digits only.

segmentTextColor.label: Segment number color
segmentTextColor.hint: Set the color of the Segment Number.

segmentBoxColor.label: Segment box color
segmentBoxColor.hint: Set the color of the Segment Box.

maintextColor.label: Message Text Color
maintextColor.hint: Set the color of the Message text.

secondarytextColor.label: Description Text Color
secondarytextColor.hint: Set the color of the Description text.

audioControl.label: Audio control
audioControl.hint: Set the volume levels for background music or main asset audio on the slide.

options.label: Play Music Only
options.hint: Keep the main asset audio muted and play background music.

options.label: Mix Music and Main Asset Audio
options.hint: Mix the main asset audio with the background music.

options.label: Play Main Asset Audio Only
options.hint: Mute the background music and play only the main asset audio.

musicAudioLevel.label: Music Level
musicAudioLevel.hint: Set the music level when choosing "Mix…". 0dB equals default music level.

layerAudioLevel.label: Main Asset Audio Level
layerAudioLevel.hint: Set the audio level for the main asset. Up to 12dB boost.

showlogo.label: Show logo
showlogo.hint: Set the visibility for the logo on the slide.

highlightColor.label: Highlight color
highlightColor.hint: Set the color of the highlighted text.

tintColor.label: Tint Color
tintColor.hint: Set the color of the tint.

tintOpacity.label: Tint opacity
tintOpacity.hint: Set the opacity of the tint.

filterOpacity.label: Filter opacity
filterOpacity.hint: Set the opacity of the filter.

canvasColor.label: Canvas color
canvasColor.hint: Set the color of the slide canvas.

showcredit.label: Show main asset credit
showcredit.hint: Set the visibility for the main asset credit.

backXpos.label: X-position
backXpos.hint: Set the x-position of your main asset: Images and videos.

backYpos.label: Y-position
backYpos.hint: Set the y-position of your main asset: Images and videos.

options.label: Center
options.hint: The background will be centered on the Y-axis.

behaviorCheck.label: Image animation
behaviorCheck.hint: Set animation behavior for your main image.

flipX.label: Flip asset horizontally
flipX.hint: The main asset will be mirrored on the X-axis.

flipY.label: Flip asset vertically
flipY.hint: The main asset will be mirrored on the Y-axis.

tintParent.label: Tint
tintParent.hint: Apply a tint that covers the slide. Choose behavior, color and opacity below.
tintParent.slideHint: Turn Tint on or off for the slide.
tintParent.groupHint: Turn Tint on or off for the group.

tintFade.label: Tint Fade
tintFade.hint: The tint effect fades in at the beginning of the slide.
tintFade.slideHint: Control Tint Fade behavior for the slide: Fade in at the start of and/or fade out at the end of the slide.
tintFade.groupHint: Control Tint Fade behavior for the group: Fade in on the first and/or out on the last slide in the group.

tintColor.label: Tint Color
tintColor.hint: Set the color of the tint.
tintColor.slideHint: Set Tint Color for the slide.
tintColor.groupHint: Set Tint Color for the group.

tintOpacity.label: Tint opacity
tintOpacity.hint: Set the opacity of the tint.
tintOpacity.slideHint: Adjust Tint Opacity for the slide.
tintOpacity.groupHint: Adjust Tint Opacity for the group.

duotoneParent.label: Slide Duotone
duotoneParent.slideHint: Apply a duotone effect to your asset. Choose behavior, colors and intensity below.
duotoneParent.groupHint: Apply a duotone effect to your asset. Choose behavior, colors and intensity below.

duotoneFade.label: Fade
duotoneFade.slideHint: Control Duotone Fade behavior for the slide: Fade in at the start of and/or fade out at the end of the slide.
duotoneFade.groupHint: Control Duotone Fade behavior for the group: Fade in on the first and/or out on the last slide in the group.

duotoneHighlightsColor.label: Highlights Color
duotoneHighlightsColor.slideHint: Set the color of the Highlights (replacement for "white").
duotoneHighlightsColor.groupHint: Set the color of the Highlights (replacement for "white").

duotoneShadowsColor.label: Shadows Color
duotoneShadowsColor.slideHint: Set the color of the Shadowns (replacement for "black").
duotoneShadowsColor.groupHint: Set the color of the Shadowns (replacement for "black").

duotoneOpacity.label: Opacity
duotoneOpacity.slideHint: Set the opacity of the Duotone effect.
duotoneOpacity.groupHint: Set the opacity of the Duotone effect.

duotoneIntensity.label: Intensity
duotoneIntensity.slideHint: Set the intensity of the Duotone effect – ie how much contrast it has.
duotoneIntensity.groupHint: Set the intensity of the Duotone effect – ie how much contrast it has.

filterParent.label: Filter
filterParent.hint: Apply a filter to give your asset a stylized look. Choose behavior and type below.
filterParent.slideHint: Turn Filter on or off for the slide.
filterParent.groupHint: Turn Filter on or off for the group.

filterFade.label: Filter Fade
filterFade.hint: The filter effect fades in at the beginning of the slide.
filterFade.slideHint: Control Filter Fade behavior for the slide: Fade in at the start of and/or fade out at the end of the slide.
filterFade.groupHint: Control Filter Fade behavior for the group: Fade in on the first and/or out on the last slide in the group.

filterType.label: Filter type
filterType.slideHint: Set Filter Type for the slide.
filterType.groupHint: Set Filter Type for the group.

filterOpacity.label: Filter opacity
filterOpacity.hint: Set the opacity of the filter.
filterOpacity.slideHint: Adjust Filter Opacity for the slide.
filterOpacity.groupHint: Adjust Filter Opacity for the group.

monochromeParent.label: Monochrome
monochromeParent.hint: Apply a monochrome effect to your asset. Choose behavior below.
monochromeParent.slideHint: Turn Monochrome on or off for the slide.
monochromeParent.groupHint: Turn Monochrome on or off for the group.

monochromeFade.label: Monochrome Fade
monochromeFade.slideHint: Control Monochrome Fade behavior for the slide: Fade in at the start of and/or fade out at the end of the slide.
monochromeFade.groupHint: Control Monochrome Fade behavior for the group: Fade in on the first and/or out on the last slide in the group.

blurParent.label: Blur
blurParent.hint: Apply a blur to your asset. Choose behavior below.
blurParent.slideHint: Turn Blur on or off for the slide.
blurParent.groupHint: Turn Blur on or off for the group.

blurFade.label: Blur Fade
blurFade.hint: The blur effect fades in at the beginning of the slide.
blurFade.slideHint: Control Blur Fade behavior for the slide: Fade in at the start of and/or fade out at the end of the slide.
blurFade.groupHint: Control Blur Fade behavior for the group: Fade in on the first and out on the last slide in the group.

advancedTintParent.slideHint: Turn Advanced Tint on or off for the slide.
advancedTintParent.groupHint: Turn Advanced Tint on or off for the group.

advancedTintInColor.slideHint: Set the color of the Start tint.
advancedTintInColor.groupHint: Set the color of the Start tint.

advancedTintInOpacity.slideHint: Set the opacity of the Start tint.
advancedTintInOpacity.groupHint: Set the opacity of the Start tint.

advancedTintHoldColor.slideHint: Set the color of the Main tint.
advancedTintHoldColor.groupHint: Set the color of the Main tint.

advancedTintHoldOpacity.slideHint: Set the opacity of the Main tint.
advancedTintHoldOpacity.groupHint: Set the opacity of the Main tint.

advancedTintOutColor.slideHint: Set the color of the End tint.
advancedTintOutColor.groupHint: Set the color of the End tint.

advancedTintOutOpacity.slideHint: Set the opacity of the End tint.
advancedTintOutOpacity.groupHint: Set the opacity of the End tint.

advancedTintInDuration.slideHint: Adjust the time for the transition between the Start tint and the Main tint – color and opacity.
advancedTintInDuration.groupHint: Adjust the time for the transition between the Start tint and the Main tint – color and opacity.

advancedTintOutDuration.slideHint: Adjust the time for the transition between the Main tint and the End tint – color and opacity.
advancedTintOutDuration.groupHint: Adjust the time for the transition between the Main tint and the End tint – color and opacity.

advancedTintEaseIn.slideHint: When checked, an easing curve is applied on the transition. When unchecked, the transition is linear.
advancedTintEaseIn.groupHint: When checked, an easing curve is applied on the transition. When unchecked, the transition is linear.

advancedTintEaseOut.slideHint: When checked, an easing curve is applied on the transition. When unchecked, the transition is linear.
advancedTintEaseOut.groupHint: When checked, an easing curve is applied on the transition. When unchecked, the transition is linear.
